duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of data engineers in delivering data and knowledge products that advance the organization's data capabilities.
Architect the data delivery and operational strategy for the team, deconstruct complex data requests, and drive engineering efficiencies.
Partner with other data engineering leads to conceptualize the design of new data flows and ways of working.
Design innovative strategies to create a better environment for end users and construct coordinated plans for change.
Champion proper ways of working and engineering discipline, including QMS framework and CI/CD best practices.
Keen on bettering technical knowledge and acting as the knowledge holder for the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Engineering, Computer Science, or Software Engineering (Master's or PhD preferred)
